Blog.post: WEll this is The second night in a row that i have spent the nigh with my bf Whit Quinn!!! it has been awesome!! we were going to go swimming at the neighbors but he never asked us.. TOO BAD! we really wanted to go swimming!! And last night my boyfriend.. came over.. and Whit sistere kassie boyfriend came over..too. They were both being jerks to us!! OHH WELL... well i am going outside!! See Ya lata.. Peace -Krissy-

Well i have been babysitting my neighbors all week this week.. i guess it has been ok... Except making everyone agree on what the want to eat.. SEE.. i am babysitting a 3, 8, & a 11 year old.. FUN FUN...Well i have to babysitt them tomorrow to... This is the good day.... PAY DAY!!! YAY YAY YAY!!!! Well I am out PEACE -Krissy-

ok!!! i forgot to sighn on and tell you if i had a relapse or not.. but i guess i was lucky i didn't... YAY!!! Well i dont think i will try to play volleyball when i am sick again because i have been getting alot of headaches latley!! UHH OHH--- Well i am out PEACE -Krissy-

Well.... here is a Story all week I ahve been at my aunts fixing my cousins hair and other peoples hair for weedings... i had to many people come up to me and go.." you should go in the Hair buisnness!!" that is a great compliment.. but me in the Hair buiz??? RIGHT!!! BUT Maybe???? Well i gotta go.. Whit if you are reading this...that is where i have been all weekend!!! LATA!!

Volleyball is my faviorte sport. My position on the court is A spiker.. and a passer!!! Well and i serve very well but everyone is a server!! HEHE!! Well i just got back from Volleybal.. and me and my dad got in an argument cause he did not want me to have a relapse.. See i just got over and ear infection and strep throat.... and a relapse is when you feel fine but the you get sick again and it is ten times worse... WEll i played.. and i will tell you tommorow if i had a relapse!! Well we were playing this game called Queen of the courts.. and our team one.. IT was me, Britt King, and Coach Ball!!! (she is tha assistant coach).. anyways coach said that Coach Ball is better that anyone of us but the reason the one was cause of Krissy... she hustled and plus she is sick sooo.!! NOt meaning to brag but you kno.. it makes you feel good inside.. HEHE.. well i am talking.. to my b/f.. so i will talk lata.. I am out!!!

OMG Whit how did you know that i was going to say that...(What are yuo wearing....) you said to Volleyball.... And then later you read my mind about the beta thing.. HAHAHA>>> You not knowing how much a foot was.. HEHE... NEVER eat ice Cream on the phone again.. you hang up on me to much... *LOL* WEll i am going to V-ball practice.. later..... I AM OUT!!!! Luv ya Girlie!!!

Well, i would tell you her name but that is none of your buissness!!! She is really pretty( hint hint) SHe has always been there for me when i needed her.. she is super funny.. and When we aew together .. watch.. out.. cause we are so accident prone!! One time she was spendding tha night with me and she was in the restroom.. and i ran from my closet to the living room couch and did a 360 flip.. and the Couch hit the wall hard and shook off an 210 dollar mirror that my mom bought at Peir One... it was Hanging by one screw!! UHH OHH!!!and we got it back up there... and later on that month my mom later discoverd a whole in the wall!!! OH well.. well i gotta go and that is all for now,.. KISSES

WEll i already told you that i met this guy in Alanta,Georgia.. his name is Daniel Ayers.. i think he is really HOT.. but that is just me.. anyway.. I met him at a dance.. and me and my best friend were walking around with and WHit (my best frined)ran into them.. and she goes what is your name.. he goes Daniel and he did this high five thing wich is soo cute.. well to make it short.. Whit met a guys Dustin Gamza. and i met Daniel... HEHE.. YAY.. I THINK IT IS LOVE>>>

Well i made the high school volley ball team... we have to do all these hard drills... See most people think that Volleyball is easy but really its not.. it takes alot of concentrating and moving.. you never kno where the ball is going to fall!! Well my favorite Drill is called pursuit.. he throws balls in places and we have to hustle.. to get the balls... he throws them anywhere!!* Fun fun.. Really it is!! *lol* Well i have to go clean the dumb kitchen See ya lata Peace Krissy

Ohh my gosh it has been like forever sense i have wrote you guys.. i am sorry.. but that is ok!! Well i havent done much except played volleyball and babysitted,.. FUN.. *lol* Naww.. i like to babysitted.. well back to volleyball.. i have this big A** bruice on my thigh. .and it hurts really bad!!* See when we were in Middle school they did not teach us the propper way to dive... and now we try to learn how to do it!! WRONG.. well right.. but it hurts.. dont try it at home...*lol* well there is soo much to talk about! Well i will talk lata.. ly ... Krissy
